title: Misunderstood Lousy Cop: Getting Promoted for Running Criminals Over - Novel Updates
tags: Criminals   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Murders   Police
author: Mazi Manzi   馬路まんじ
description:
Shiraki Touya is a 29-year-old cop.

He’s a total klutz that runs people over and accidentally shoots someone every few months. Luckily, everyone he has injured turned out to be merciless criminals! So, thanks to his intelligent looks coupled with his white hair and glasses, he began to be revered as ‘The White Enforcer’.

You can’t hear it, but today, just like every other day, he’s screaming inside, saying, “please don’t respect someone like me!!”>
